parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.14</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Mods and Addons </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns a list of all activated addons. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''activatedAddons''' </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_addons = '''activatedAddons''';</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[activateAddons]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value> </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part></template>

<h3 style='display:none'>Notes</h3>
<dl class='command_description'>
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on March 28, 2014 - 20:21
<dt class="note">[[User:Tankbuster|Tankbuster]]<dd class="note">
This command can return a large array, often too large to be diag_log'd or hinted. At the time of writing, my game returned an array with 389 elements. The code below will ignore all the BI addons (they start with a3_) and writes the rest (ie, all your custom addons) to the RPT.
<code>{[[if]] (! (["a3_", _x] [[call]] [[BIS_fnc_inString]])) [[then]] {[[diag_log]] _x;}  } [[forEach]] [[activatedAddons]];</code>

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
